page.title: 04REW STREET FARMS IN GURNARD.
page.content: There are five farms in Rew Street Cliff,Baskett's,Rew Street,Hart's and Duke's farm.Cliff farm is mainly run for fattening beef and is owned by Winston Downer who own's Gurnard farm.Baskett's farm is a dairy farm owned by Mr J Butchers and run by his 2 sons.Baskett's farm milks 50 cows and have around 35 young cows.They grow kale for feed,make silage and hay.Rew street farm which is the oldest farm in Rew Street now only grows corn.The owners have sold off the farmhouse and barns.These have now been turned into homes.Hart's farm is owned by Mr.Mrs Cherry they are semi-retired.They have a battery of about 100 hens and sell the eggs locally.They also sell garden produce. They let the farmhouse for bed and breakfast accommodation during the season.
